controls.description: Distance resolution of the accumulator in pixels.
controls.name: rho

controls.description: Angle resolution of the accumulator in degrees.
controls.name: thetaInDegree

controls.description: Accumulator threshold parameter. Only those lines are returned that get enough votes (>threshold).
controls.name: threshold

controls.description: Minimum line length. Line segments shorter than that are rejected.
controls.name: minLineLength

controls.description: Maximum allowed gap between points on the same line to link them.
controls.name: maxLineGap
